channel.title: Vegetarianish on Nhuyhoa Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in Vegetarianish on Nhuyhoa Recipes

item.title: 7 Layer Bar
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit butter butterscotch chips chocolate chips chopped nuts coconut flakes graham crackers sweetened condensed milk

item.title: Alfredo Dairy-Free
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit cashews japanese sweet potato date garlic powder onion miso paste mushroom seasoning nutritional yeast pepper salt soy milk

item.title: Banana Bread
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit baking powder eggs banana baking soda butter cinnamon flour pecans salt sugar vanilla yogurt

item.title: Banh Flan Ca Phe
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit Cafe Du Monde coffee eggs Longevity sweetened condensed milk sugar whole milk Instructions instructions Put 4 spoons of coffee into a coffee press Pour boiling water into pressor and refill for a total of 3 times Let coffee cool for several hours Stir in milk, want a ratio 2 coffee : 1 milk Caramelize sugar with a little water until golden and coat over cake pan/walls Crack and beat 8 eggs at room temperature Stir in 3-4 spoons of sugar Stir in 1 can of longevity sweetened condensed milk Stir in coffee Pour into caramelized coated cake pan Steam for 20-25 min, want a light boil Turn off and let cake sit in steamer for 5 min Set out to cool and then refrigerate If more coffee desired, pour it onto cake after it has cooled

item.title: Bap Cai Luoc (Cabbage and Egg Sauce)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit nuoc mam eggs cabbage Instructions instructions Hard boil egg Cut up and boil cabbage Mash up egg and add nuoc mam & water Save the veggie broth and eat/drink as a canh

item.title: Bo Xao Khoai Tay Chien (Beef and French Fries Stir Fry)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit oyster sauce beef cilantro pepper fries rice vinegar garlic salt mushroom onion shallot tomato

item.title: Canh Bau (Opo Squash Soup)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit chicken broth pork rib tips cilantro fish sauce shrimp green onions mushroom seasoning opo squash pepper shallot salt Instructions instructions Season meat with salt, pepper, and shallots Season squash (cut into strips or cubes) with salt and pepper Saute minced shallots until slightly golden Stir in meat and squash Add water/broth, adjust to taste with various seasonings Simmer for 5-10 min In last few minutes, add green onions and cilantro

item.title: Canh Ca Chua Dau Hu (Tofu and Tomato Soup)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit nuoc mam fish tofu cilantro wonton soup base pork rib tips garlic tofu green onions tofu puffs onion shallot tomato

item.title: Canh Cai Cuc (Chrysanthemum Soup)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit chicken broth ground chicken chrysanthemum wonton soup base ground pork shallot Instructions instructions Saute minced shallots until slightly golden Stir fry ground pork until no longer pink Add an equal amount of water and chicken broth Season with wonton soup base Adjust broth to taste, want it light Cut chrysanthemums (cai cuc, tung ho) into 3 in lengths, use the stems if they are tender enough Add steams first then leaves Bring to a small simmer and then remove from heat

item.title: Canh Khoai Mo (Ube Soup)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit chicken broth shrimp rice paddy herbs pepper shallot salt ube wonton soup base Instructions instructions Process peeled shrimp, salt, pepper, and shallots Saute minced shallots until slightly golden Add shrimp mixture Add chicken broth and wonton soup base Bring to a boil, then lower heat Add mashed ube (khoai mo bao) and simmer Add rice paddy herbs (ngo om) in the last few minutes

item.title: Canh Khoai Tay Suon (Taro and Pork Rib Soup)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit chicken broth pork rib tips japanese sweet potato macaroni rice paddy herbs pepper shallot salt taro wonton soup base Instructions instructions Marinate the pork rib tips with salt and pepper Add one layer of pork and sear both sides until golden; do not crowd pan, use multiple batches if needed Golden minced shallots Add water or chicken broth and adjust to medium high heat Add sweet potato and simmer until cooked If cooking with taro, boil in a separate pot due to shorter cooking time Add wonton soup base, adjust to taste Add rice paddy herbs (ngo om) in the last few minutes Eat with rice or nui

item.title: Canh Muop Mong Toi (Spinach and Luffa Soup)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit pepper dried shrimp malabar spinach salt shallot wonton soup base taiwanese okra Instructions instructions Soak dried shrimp in hot water and mash dried shrimp Stir fry taiwanese okra (luffa) & shallots with salt & pepper Add bowl of dried shrimp & additional water Add wonton soup base Add malabar spinach prior to boiling Adjust to taste as necessary Canh spoils easily, so refridgerate when cool

item.title: Canh Rau Ram
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit chicken broth beef shank onion pepper shallot salt vietnamese coriander wonton soup base Instructions instructions Slice shanks and season with salt and pepper Golden shallots and onions Sear meat Add water and adjust to taste with various seasonings Simmer until cooked Add chopped raw ram in last few minutes

item.title: Cauliflower Soup
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit bread cauliflower lime chicken broth chives gold raisins cilantro ground coriander dill ground cumin garlic pepper mint salt onion yogurt shallot

item.title: Chao (Porridge)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit gio chao quay chicken ginger jasmine rice green onions pepper shallot salt wonton soup base Instructions instructions Marinate chicken with salt, pepper & shallots Make rice Boil chicken until sufficient internal temp Add rice, smashed ginger, and boil until it has expanded (~1 hr) Add wonton soup base Eat with pepper, green onions, shredded chicken, gio chao quay

item.title: Che Thai (Vietnamese Fruit Cocktail)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit amyl acetate flavoring essence jackfruit half & half longan nata de coco Instructions instructions Cut the jackfruit into strips Combine longan, jackfruit, and nata de coco in a big container Add all of syrup from fruit cans (all of longan and some of jackfruit as needed) and 2 cups of half & half Add 1 drop of amyl acetate flavoring essence Mix well and serve with crushed ice

item.title: Com Chien (Fried Rice)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit chicken powder eggs garlic any pepper any onion rice shallot salt any soy sauce Instructions instructions Make rice with less rice or use day-old rice that is dry Prepare and cook the meat and veggies, drying thoroughly Saute minced shallots, garlic, and onions until slightly golden Add eggs on low power Add salt, pepper, soy sauce Scramble eggs and add moderate amount of rice Stir fry rice and add seasonings (salt, pepper, soy sauce, chicken powder) to liking Once rice is done (fried and toasty), stir in meat and veggies

item.title: Dau Hu Sot Ca Chua (Fried Tofu with Tomato Sauce)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit nuoc mam tofu garlic green onions onion tomato Instructions instructions Fry tofu Saute onions, garlic, and tomato in a pot When tomatoes have softened, add very small bowl of water Add fried tofu Add with nuoc mam and water for flavor Add a starch slurry and simmer for 15 min Add green onions in last few minutes

item.title: Dau Hu Teriyaki (Teriyaki Tofu)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit teriyaki sauce tofu Instructions instructions Fry tofu Set tofu aside and allow oil to drain Simmer teriyaki sauce on medium heat until the sauce becomes thick Add tofu and coat with sauce

item.title: Dau Hu Xao Hanh (Stir Fried Tofu and Green Onions)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit nuoc mam tofu green onions shallot Instructions instructions Cut shallots and green onions Make a 1:1 mixture of water and nuoc mam in a small bowl Fry tofu Saute minced shallots until slightly golden Add green onions and stir until they soften Add tofu and sauce mixture Stir and adjust to taste, remove from heat after a few minutes

item.title: Dau Xanh Xao (Green Bean Stir Fry)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit oyster sauce garlic pepper green bean salt hanh kho mushroom onion shallot Instructions instructions Steam green beans for about half the cook time Saute minced shallots and garlic until slightly golden Stir in green beans, mushrooms, and sliced onion until soft Drizzle in diluted oyster sauce (1:1 ratio)

item.title: Dim Sum Veggies
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit oyster sauce bok choy soy sauce chinese broccoli sugar garlic wonton soup base Instructions instructions Blanche bok choy Mix 3 oyster sauce : 1 soy sauce : 2 sugar, and some wonton soup base or water Saute minced garlic until slightly golden Stir fry bok choy for a couple minutes Add water and steam for a couple minutes Arrange on plate and drizzle with sauce

item.title: Dua Chua (Pickled Mustard Greens)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit brown sugar green onions salt mustard greens Instructions instructions Cut mustard greens Using the white parts of the green onions, cut into quarter circles Mix 1.75 tbsp brown sugar, 1 tbsp salt, and 1L of warm water Before adding the salt and water, squeeze the brown sugar and green onions Taste mixture, should be sweet and sour Add mustard green leaves Squeeze the mixture Pour mixture into a container and tightly seal Store in a warm place for a few days Try a piece, want it to be sweet and sour Place in fridge when it has the desired taste

item.title: Eggs Omelette
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit mien eggs dried fungus mushroom nuoc mam pha ground pork onion pepper shallot salt soy sauce Instructions instructions Soak mien and a few fungus separately in boiling water for a couple minutes, drain, rinse and repeat Combine eggs and mixed fillings Saute minced shallots until slightly golden Add egg mixture Cook both sides until golden Serve with nuoc mam pha

item.title: Fried Plantains
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit butter plantain Instructions instructions Cut overripe plantains into slices Fry plantains in melted butter

item.title: Fruit Tart
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit graham cracker crust any yogurt Instructions instructions Assemble ingredients

item.title: Garlic Mashed Potatoes (with Gravy and Hot Honey Sauce)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit apple cider vinegar garlic bourbon potato butter shallot chicken broth cumin flour honey milk mustard powder paprika pepper salt sugar tomato powder

item.title: Goi (Salad)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit apple cider vinegar lettuce pepper onion salt tomato sugar Instructions instructions In a small bowl, mix sugar, apple cider vinegar, sliced yellow onion, and pinch of black pepper Slice tomatoes and sprinkle with salt and sugar Cut lettuce to bite-sided pieces Mix tomatoes, lettuce and sauce Serve with rice and a meat dish

item.title: Goi Ga (Vietnamese Chicken Salad)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit nuoc mam pha chicken cabbage pepper any hanh kho roast peanut onion salt thai basil sugar vietnamese coriander vinegar

item.title: Goi Salsa (Salsa)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit pepper cabbage avocado salt cilantro lime sugar corn mandarin orange cucumber mango edamame any lettuce mint red onion tomato any

item.title: Kothu Parotta
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit garam masala egg cilantro ground coriander cilantro ground cumin cucumber leftover curry sauce dill parotta garlic pepper ginger salt mint yogurt onion tomato

item.title: Mango Sticky Rice
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit coconut milk mango salt sugar sweet rice Instructions instructions Rinse and soak sweet rice in cold water overnight Cook sweet rice in rice cooker Make coconut sauce by heating half can of coconut milk with 3 sugar : 1 salt mixture and a starchy slurry, adjust to taste Soak xoi with coconut sauce and let it sit for 30 min before serving Serve with cold mangoes

item.title: Mint Pea Soup
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit chicken broth garlic ground coriander mint ground cumin onion pepper pea salt shallot yogurt Instructions instructions Caramelize onion and shallots with a sprinkle of salt Once browned, add minced garlic and ground coriander & cumin Add peas and chicken broth to just cover, adjust to taste Simmer until peas are cooked (2-4 min) Cool then blend with mints and a spoon of yogurt until smooth Adjust to taste with salt & pepper Garnish with sliced mint

item.title: Mochi
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit cornstarch glutinous rice flour ice cream sugar Instructions instructions Scoop ice cream into balls and place in muffin cups and freeze until it hardens Mix a ratio of 2 glutinous rice flour : 3 sugar : 3 water Add jam flavorings if desired Cover and microwave for 2 minutes Mix and microwave for another 40 seconds Mix until glossy Add mochi to a tray covered with corn starch Sprinkle corn starch on top, lightly pat and spread mochi out on tray Refrigerate for 30-60 min Cut into mochi square pieces and remove excess starch Layer mochi pieces between saran wrap Refrigerate for another 30-60 min Place ice cream scoop onto mochi and fold up the sides and seal Use saran wrap to maintain seal Freeze until the mochi firms up If there are extra mochi pieces, cut them up into small pieces and freeze to make mini mochis

item.title: Pesto
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit cashews basil date nutritional yeast cilantro lime olive oil dill any pepper garlic salt mint soy milk vietnamese coriander any

item.title: Rau Muong Xao Toi (Stir Fried Water Spinach)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit mam tom garlic shallot water spinach Instructions instructions Blanche water spinach (rau muong, ong choy) until texture is sufficiently cooked/crunchy, stems should go longer than leaves Saute minced shallots and garlic until slightly golden Add in water spinach Stir in diluted mam tom Stir fry for few minutes Save liquid used for blanching for canh

item.title: Roast Sweet Potato
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit Kerrygold butter japanese sweet potato Penzeys Paris Seasoning onion garlic powder white miso Instructions instructions Preheat oven to 450F Poke the japanese sweet potato with a fork Bake for 30-45 min Make miso butter by 1 miso : 2 butter (unsalted) Steam sliced onions in microwave with miso butter for 10 min Spread miso butter on roast sweet potato with paris seasoning / garlic powder Eat roast potato with onions

item.title: Royal Tea
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit Tea zone golden milk tea brown sugar creamer honey Instructions instructions Make tea, combine ingredients and adjust to taste

item.title: Salad Dressing
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit balsamic vinegar garlic date cilantro ginger dijon mustard shallot mint oil oregano pepper rice vinegar salt sesame oil white miso

item.title: Smoothie
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit apple juice spinach banana orange juice blueberries passionfruit juice date soy milk mandarin orange vanilla honey yogurt mango mango kesar peach pineapple strawberry

item.title: Xoi Che Hoa Cau
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit flavoring extract peeled mung bean salt sugar tapioca starch xoi vo Instructions instructions Rinse, soak, steam a few spoons of mung bean (as with xoi vo) Dissolve 3.

item.title: Xoi Vo
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit peeled mung bean cha hanh kho salt sweet rice Instructions instructions Want a ratio of 3 sweet rice : 1 peeled mung bean Rinse and soak each separately in cold water overnight Rinse and and drain separately Let the rice sit and dry while you work on the mung beans Steam mung bean for 15-20 min, it should hold its shape but can be smashed between fingers Granulate mung been until powdery Mix rice with mung bean, 1 tbsp salt, and 1 tsp oil Steam for 60 min Take it out and let it cool, want it to be dry and well separated Eat with cha, hanh kho or che hoa cau
